GAZA.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company GAZ manufactures and sells commercial motor vehicles primarily in Russia. The company offers light commercial vehicles under the GAZelle NEXT, GAZelle BUSINESS, and Sobol names; and medium duty trucks under the GAZon Next, GAZ-3309, Sadko, and Zemliak names, as well as specialty vehicles. It also provides all-wheelÂdrive off-road and heavy duty trucks; buses and coaches; diesel engines, fuel injection equipment for diesel engines, and gearboxes; and auto components, such as iron castings, forged products, stampings, dies and molds, tools, systems and assemblies, and non-ferrous castings. The company was formerly known as Open Joint Stock Company GAZ and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company GAZ in June 2016. The company is based in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company GAZ is a subsidiary of Russkie Mashiny, Ooo.

It also provides all-wheelÂdrive off-road and heavy duty trucks; buses and coaches; diesel engines, fuel injection equipment for diesel engines, and gearboxes; and auto components, such as iron castings, forged products, stampings, dies and molds, tools, systems and assemblies, and non-ferrous castings. NFAZ.ME.summary: NEFAZ Publicly Traded Company operates in the automobile industry in Russia. It produces buses, tank trucks, flatbed trailers, crew buses, fire fighting equipment, semi-trailers, tank semi-trailers, tank trailers, dump trucks, tipper semi-trailers, tipper trailers, flatbed trailers, and agricultural machinery, as well as car chassis and spare parts. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Neftekamsk, Russia. NEFAZ Publicly Traded Company operates as a subsidiary of KAMAZ Publicly Traded Company.

PAZA.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Pavlovo Bus
PAZA.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Pavlovo Bus produces and sells buses and special vehicles, automotive components, and spare parts in Russia. It also sells illiquid assets. The company was formerly known as Pavlovsky Avtobusny Zavod. The company was founded in 1932 and is based in Pavlovo, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Pavlovo Bus is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company GAZ.

SVAV.ME.summary: Sollers Public Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells vehicles in Russia. It offers SUVs and LCVs; and automotive components, assembly kits, and engines. The company markets and sells its products under the UAZ, ZMZ, Ford Sollers, and Mazda Sollers brands. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Sollers Public Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of ERFIX LLC.
